removeTabAt(int) - Method in class org.schwering.evi.gui.main.TabBar
Removes a panel with this procedure: If the component at the index is the panel of a module (e.g. if the corresponding object in the internal hashtable is instance of IModule), the module is disposed with ModuleFactory.disposeInstance.
